alert.note: Alert for Carter; Murray (Oklahoma) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 07 at 9:51AM CDT until July 07 at 10:30AM CDT by NWS Norman-Oklahoma City
info.description: The National Weather Service in Norman has issued a * Severe Thunderstorm Warning for... Carter County in southern Oklahoma... Southern Murray County in southern Oklahoma... * Until 1030 AM CDT. * At 951 AM CDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Graham, moving east at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. * Locations impacted include... Ardmore, Sulphur, Davis, Lone Grove, Healdton, Wilson, Dickson, Springer, Dougherty, Gene Autry, Tatums, Graham, Pooleville, Lake Of The Arbuckles, Lake Murray, Turner Falls, Milo, and Overbrook. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
